item.title: Storytelling + video editor to create hype reel for a person - Upwork
item.description:
Looking for a skilled video creator to tell stories about designers in this format - https://youtu.be/cxDjZJ0rJuo?si=lDaiufEpFMxP45CY

Think like a video resume, designer worked at x,y,z, skilled in motion design, built this feature.

Video should be 30 seconds long and in a format I can reproduce.

You will need to script write and organize the video story as well based on given info regarding the designer.

Budget: $1,000
Posted On: June 30, 2024 03:12 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Testimonial Video, Video Editing, Video Production, Explainer Video, Copywriting
Skills: Testimonial Video, Video Editing, Video Production, Explainer Video, Copywriting
Country: United States

item.title: Icelandic speaker wanted - motivational video - Upwork
item.description:
Your task is to make a video lasting 20-40 seconds. We will provide you with the script. It doesn't matter if you have any experience in filming before. The main thing is the ability to convey the text in an interesting and convincing way, as well as show emotions such as laughter, joy, fun and a little acting.
If the script requires props, they should also be shown properly.

Please note that this offer is only for Icelandic speakers.

Budget: $25
Posted On: June 30, 2024 03:05 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Production, UGC, Acting, Male, Female, Video Editing, Voice Acting
Skills: Video Production, UGC, Acting, Male, Female, Video Editing, Voice Acting
Country: Turkey
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
I am looking for someone to help edit some of my video content.

I climb roofs for work, and I have a small YouTube channel.

I want to start showing people how I climb some of the roofs.

I will record the video; I need a video editor to combine everything and make it great.

I have editing software like Adobe Premiere Pro, but I don't have the time to do the editing.  

Budget: $50
Posted On: June 30, 2024 02:59 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Concept Video, Corporate Video, Explainer Video, Footage-Based Video, Live Action Video, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Production, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Concept Video, Corporate Video, Explainer Video, Footage-Based Video, Live Action Video, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Production, Video Post-Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Podcast video and audio editing - Upwork
item.description:
I want to engage a video and audio podcast editor in Delhi who can work on my podcasts release in YouTube etc.
I will give him or her raw file with my video recording and a separate audio file.
We want him or her to edit and publish 7 minute podcast every two weeks.
This means 14 minute of produced video and audio every month
I can pay 1400 rupees per video
This means 2800 rupees per month.
This can go on for one year
You must have experience in this business and have necessary equipment and software

Budget: $10
Posted On: June 30, 2024 02:49 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Audio Editing, Sound Mixing, Video Editing
Skills: Audio Editing, Sound Mixing, Video Editing
Country: Australia
click to apply
